spec_data.Name: nafees-naskh-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Character based Nafees Naskh Open Type Font for writing Urdu in Naskh\
script with full aerab support based on Unicode standard.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 12:39:20 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Nafees naskh font for writing Urdu in the Naskh script with full aerab support
